title: Showers or thundershowers in parts of the island today
content: Showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Northern, North-central, Eastern and Uva provinces and in Matale and Hambantota districts.Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places elsewhere during the evening or night. Fairly heavy showers above 50 mm can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.
